original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God: Surely I have spoken in my hot jealousy against the rest of the nations and against all Edom, who gave my land to themselves as a possession with wholehearted joy and utter contempt, that they might make its pasturelands a prey.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 내가 진실로 내 맹렬한 질투로 남아 있는 이방인과 에돔 온 땅을 쳐서 말하였노니 이는 그들이 심히 즐거워하는 마음과 멸시하는 심령으로 내 땅을 빼앗아 노략하여 자기 소유를 삼았음이라

sentences.original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God:
Surely I have spoken in my hot jealousy
against the rest of the nations
who gave my land to themselves as a possession
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 땅을 자기 소유로 삼았으니

sentences.original_text: with wholehearted joy and utter contempt,
sentences.korean_translation: 온 마음을 다해 기뻐하며 완전히 멸시하며

sentences.original_text: that they might make its pasturelands a prey.
